actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. Relations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the village of Mariemont, Ohio, a parcel of land that is under the jurisdiction of the Corps of Engineers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey to Mariemont, Ohio, all U.S. rights and interest to specified real property known as the Ohio River Division Laboratory.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the village of Mariemont, Ohio, a parcel of land that is under the jurisdiction of the Corps of Engineers, and for other purposes.
